widget.name: Trash Masti
widget.description:
Turn your Trash into Cash
Let's sell your scrap thats cover your area into mess. Stop blaming yourself that how can you pick the trash and waste it. Simple download Our TrashMasti App or vist the website TrashMasti.com, estimate your scrap value. Trash hero will come to your door step and pick all your recyclables.
Stop wasting your time for Kaabar wala to came and buy your recyclable Now,
Selling your Recyclables is just one click away
Sell your scrap when you free and at home TrashHero will be there on your desired time.
widget.author: Kumail Mehdi
